text: Hubaal Allaah Isaga Keliya baa Ogsoon waqtiga Saacadda (Qiyaame), oo soo dejiya roobka, oo Wuxuu Ogsoon yahay waxa ku jira ilma galeennada9. Oo nafna ma oga maxay kasban doontaa berri10, oo nafina ma oga dhulkee bay ku dhiman doontaa. Hubaal Allaah waa wax kasta Ogsoone, ka War Haya (wax walba)
